title: Voyage to the Planet of Prehistoric Women
description: The 1967 film 'Voyage to the Planet of Prehistoric Women' is a science fiction adventure directed by Peter Bogdanovich. It follows astronauts who land on Venus and encounter prehistoric women worshiping a Pterodactyl-like god. The film juxtaposes advanced technology with primitive beliefs, highlighting cultural clashes and communication barriers. Noted for its campy style and B-movie charm, it's a classic example of 1960s sci-fi cinema.

title: Last Woman on Earth
description: Ev, her husband Harold, and their friend Martin go scuba diving while on vacation in Puerto Rico. When they surface, they find that everyone on the island has died.

title: End of the World
description: A scientist discovers signals from space that appear to carry information concerning a series of seemingly unrelated natural disasters, occurring across the globe. Hoping to discover the source of these signals and who's behind them, the scientist and his wife set out on a trek to locate the intended recipient of the signals. What the couple eventually discovers is a small remote convent with occupants who are not really who they appear to be.

title: Destroy All Planets
description: Aliens try to take over the world by seizing control of Gamera's brain.

title: Assignment Outer Space
description: In the 21st century Ray Peterson, reporter for the Interplanetary News, is assigned to write a story aboard a space station. Tension mounts between Peterson and the station commander, who believes he is in the way, but has orders to leave him alone. Errant spaceship Alpha Two enters the solar system and its photon generators are radiating enough heat to destroy Earth as it approaches. It falls to Peterson to try to figure out a way to enter the spaceship, disarm the generators, and escape before suffocating.

title: Attack from Space
description: Benevolent aliens from the planet Emerald send superhero Starman to protect Earth from invasion by an evil alien race called the Spherions. When Starman arrives on Earth, he discovers a conspiracy involving Earth's top scientists, and he must root out the traitors and also stop the impending alien invasion.

title: First Spaceship on Venus
description: A spaceship on a mission to Venus uncovers an increasingly sinister secret.

title: The Yesterday Machine
description: A Nazi scientist invents a time machine enabling him to alter the events of WWII.

title: Things to Come
description: "Things to Come" portrays a speculative future where Everytown, a London-like city, faces a devastating war starting from 1940. Despite pacifist efforts, the war leads to societal collapse and a Dark Ages by 1970, with Everytown under a barbaric warlord's rule.

title: Cosmos: War of the Planets
description: A spaceship intercepts a mysterious message and then crashes on the planet the message is being sent from. There they uncover a force that threatens to take over the Earth.

title: The Day of the Triffids
description: After an unusual meteor shower leaves most of the human population blind, a merchant navy officer must find a way to conquer tall, aggressive plants which are feeding on people and animals.

title: Phantom From Space
description: An alien being lands in Santa Monica. Killing two people who attacked him due to the menacing appearance of his spacesuit, the creature takes it off while being pursued by government authorities, revealing himself to be invisible

title: War of the Robots
description: An alien civilization, which facing eminent extinction, kidnaps two famous genetic scientists from Earth. A troop of soldiers is dispatched to combat the humanoid robots and rescue the victims.

title: When Worlds Collide
description: As a new star and planet hurtle toward a doomed Earth, a small group of survivalists frantically work to complete the rocket which will take them to their new home.

title: The Phantom Planet
description: A spaceship is drawn towards a planet populated by tiny people where the atmosphere shrinks the astronauts as well.

title: Aelita: Queen of Mars
description: A mysterious global radio message connects engineers Los and Spiridonov. Los, a dreamer, becomes fixated on Aelita, daughter of Mars' ruler Tuskub, who watches him via a telescope. Amidst turmoil, including his wife's murder, Los assumes Spiridonov's identity and constructs a spaceship. Alongside revolutionary Gusev, he journeys to Mars, where they're imprisoned by the totalitarian regime. They initiate a proletarian revolt, which Aelita hijacks to establish her own dictatorship. Disillusioned, Los tries to thwart her. The story blurs reality and fantasy, revealing the truth behind Los's experiences.

title: The Atomic Man
description: A man is fished out of a river and taken to a hospital where he briefly dies. After he revives, it's discovered that he is a nuclear research scientist, has been contaminated with radioactive material, and is oddly uncommunicative. A reporter investigates, and with the help of the scientist's doctor and the police, uncovers a plot to destroy the scientist's work as well as part of London.

title: Wizard of Mars
description: In 1975, astronauts Dorothy, Doc, Charlie, and Steve crash on Mars with minimal supplies. Struggling to survive in a barren landscape with finned maggots and canals, they navigate a golden cavern and weather a storm. Discovering an abandoned Earth ship, they follow a golden road to ancient Martian ruins. Resembling Oz's Flatheads, the Martians, controlled by a collective consciousness named "Wizard" demand a small task before allowing the astronauts to leave.

title: Invaders from Space
description: A bunch of pernicious salamander men from the planet Kulimon in the Moffit Galaxy plan on taking over Earth by unleashing a lethal plague on mankind. It's up to valiant superhero Starman from the Emerald Planet to save the human race before it's too late.

title: Deluge
description: A massive earthquake strikes the United States, which destroys the West Coast and unleashes a massive flood that threatens to destroy the East Coast as well.

title: Indestructible Man
description: Charles "The Butcher" Benton, a brutal death row inmate gets double-crossed by his crooked lawyer. He gets his chance for revenge when, after he's been executed, a bizarre experiment brings him back to life and more deadly than ever.

title: The Killer Shrews
description: On an isolated island, a small group of people is terrorised by giant, voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.
